wordpressPost.content:
As an organisation, we are central in our community; we also try to make a contribution to this. For example, as a sponsor we donate funds to Special Needs organisations, sponsor with flowers at cost price and donate flowers for activities in a Care Home.

As an organisation, we know that it’s not only about financial gain. A happy face; that’s what we like to achieve. After all, is that not what flowers are made for?

Do you need flowers for a good cause as well? Convince us of your story and who knows, we might be able to offer you a beautiful solution!
